contractObjectiveList.title: Escort Convoy to Safety and Escape

dialogueContent.words: We have friendly units about to come under fire.
Move to their position and provide support.
Get them to safety, keep them intact, and get out there when it's done.
Excellent work, Commander. The convoy has been extracted, and Sumire is on her way to get you.
Pack it in, Commander. There's nothing left we can do here.
Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
More contacts on the sensors, Commander! Looks like a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} assault team - stop them before they can destroy the convoy!
You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
Good, it looks you've secured the area around the convoy's position. They are ready to make their way towards the extraction point now. Keep them alive!
Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.

longDescription: Commander, while I imagine they will fire at targets of opportunity you shouldn't rely on support from our employer's lance. They'll be making a bee line for their extraction point.

objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try and stop the player from reaching the rally point.
objectiveList.title: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Blocking Force

objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy enemy units which will attempt to block the convoy from reaching its destination.
objectiveList.title: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

objectiveList.description: Escort Friendly units to their Destination
objectiveList.title: Escort {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy To Evac Point

objectiveList.description: Protect the all units in Convoy during Extraction, suffering no losses.
objectiveList.title: Ensure All Convoy Units Survive

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.
objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.

objectiveList.description: The objective to escape with all the player units.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
Protect Convoy as they Embark on the Dropship

shortDescription: A lance of our heaviest mechs is in poor repair after a long patrol. We have credible intelligence suggesting that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} will attempt to exploit this vulnerability. We have no other significant units available in the area so we need you to drop and run interference while we extract our mechs to a repair facility.
